basic_info.description: I’m Ian F. Shirley, a software developer & designer with a background in sales, customer service & fraud investigation. I love designing, building, and fixing things, and I'm obsessed with finding answers to the questions “how” and “why”. I’m very analytical, and motivated to find solutions to the problems I encounter, and I disagree with the phrase “if it ain’t broke, don’t try to fix it”, because I think there’s usually a way to improve on something even if it’s already working. In short, I like to find ways to maximize efficiency.  All of these things make this a rewarding career for me;  and on top of that, I hope that someday I can use those skills and attributes at a company that makes positive contributions to issues that I care about, such as homelessness or environmental sustainability.

projects.title: Target Practice
projects.description: A retro computer game in the style of the Nintendo classic, "Duck Hunt". This was my group project in Code 201 at Code Fellows. We created it using HTML, CSS & JavaScript. On the gameplay page, the user attempts to shoot the target using the crosshair cursor while the bird is animated to fly randomly around the gameplay area. We also made use of local storage to be able to save previous players' scores to the leaderboard page. The scoreboard on the gameplay screen updates the current user's score and level in real time.

projects.title: 5 O'Clock Somewhere
projects.description: Have you ever been sitting at home and craving a cocktail, but don't know what to make? Come check out our site! It will allow users to enter ingredients they have in their home bar, either alcohol or mixers, and it will return a list of cocktails you can make using the indgredients you have on hand. The site will also allow users to sign in and save the list of items in their bar.

projects.title: JobHuntHQ
projects.description: Welcome to JobHuntHQ, your one-stop solution to managing and organizing your job search journey. This application is designed to help users keep track of their job applications in a simple, efficient, and user-friendly manner.
